name: Pooled-Storage Filesystem- PFS for Linux
short_description: does fixed size volumes frustrates you ? Then, Use PFS.. Pool the partitions together (even while mounted ) expand them dynamically. The current version supports only dynamic expansion of file system but the dynamic shrinking feature will be added soon.!
